text1: This application was designed to make it easier to read the abilities of each survivor the player is using on the games Zombicide Green Horde and Zombicide Black Plague. If you want to report bugs, you can contact me by email.
text2: Settings and survivors information are saved directly to the local storage of device browser.
text3: If you would like to include any official survivor that are not in this App, please send an email with the data as shown in the example:
text4: List of all the survivors available:
text5: App for Zombicide Green Horde (and Black Plague too).
text6: Go to the menu above to configure the App language and see your Survivor(s).
reset: Reset survivors information from the local storage
text7: Watch out! Downloading all survivors can be more than 100 MB. Downloading the PDF may work only directly from your PC.
